    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_4e9bbff6e38a7fd6896c89dffad83bb41f461280</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Attraction and repulsion of magnetic poles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anziehung und Abstossung der Magnetpole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attraction et répulsion des pôles magnétiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atração e repulsion de pólos magnéticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazione e repulsione dei poli magnetici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έλξη και απέχθεια των μαγνητικών πόλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atracción y repulsión de polos magnéticos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the magnetic field lines magnets with opposite poles (A) and magnets with same poles (B).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die magnetischen
Zeilen Magneten mit gegenüberliegenden Pfosten (a) und Magneten mit 
den gleichen Pfosten (b) auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les lignes aimants avec
les pôles opposés (a) et aimants de champ magnétique avec les 
mêmes poteaux (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as linhas ímãs com 
pólos opostos (A) e ímãs do campo magnético com os mesmos pólos 
(b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le righe magneti con 
i poli opposti (A) e magneti del campo magnetico con gli stessi poli 
(b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τους μαγνήτες γραμμών 
μαγνητικών πεδίων με τους αντίθετους πόλους (A) και μαγνήτες 
με τους ίδιους πόλους (B).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las líneas imanes con 
los postes opuestos (a) e imanes del campo magnético con los mismos 
postes (b).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Anziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie Zeilen auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetpole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Abstossung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attraction magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lignes de champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pôles magnétiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">répulsion magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atração magnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linhas do campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pólos magnéticos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">repulsion magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attrazione magnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">righe del campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poli magnetici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">repulsione magnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική έλξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμμές μαγνητικών πεδίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικοί πόλοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική απέχθεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">líneas del campo magnético</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">polos magnéticos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">repulsión magnética</string>
          </keyword>
